errors.error_description: The setup instructions incorrectly place the `cd python-zulip-api` command before the `git clone` command, which will fail because the directory does not yet exist.
correction_candidates: You must create the directory with `mkdir python-zulip-api` before changing into it.
The `git clone` command should be run before the `cd` command.
The `git clone` command creates the directory, so the `cd` command is not needed.
